AMAZING is really all that needs to be said. This was easily one of the best food experiences  I've had.It's family run and you can taste that home cooking in every bite! The garbanzo swith onion and octopus  was my favorite..along with the artichokesI don't think there is anything that would disapoint.I walked out of there with the best feeling of being satisfied with a tummy full of great food and wine of course!I WILL be back!
